definition: to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries

sentences.english: YuPian is very important on literal-studying and critical interpretation of ancient texts in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 《玉篇》在我国文字学和训诂学史上至关重要。

sentences.english: Vocabulary is not the only problem in Buddhist sutra exegesis.
sentences.chinese: 佛经文献训诂中并不仅有词义训释的问题。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we mainly talk about the problem of Hermeneutic in Literati's Note of Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论宋代笔记中所记载的训诂学问题。

sentences.english: Analyzing the sentence is one of the important parts of the Chinese exegetics .
sentences.chinese: 训诂学对句子的解释也是以意义为中心的。

sentences.english: Chapter Three:analyze the feature of Zheng Xuan's gloss in Guwen Shangshu Zhu by examples.
sentences.chinese: 第三章翠例分析了郑氏《古文尚害注》的训诂特点。

definition: study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
